contents.contents: Keep walking along the ramparts to the Jouy Door. Why not climb the ramparts?
It was built in the 13th century and recently renovated. There used to be a pinnacle turret and you can attend the show “The Eagles of the Ramparts” from it.

question.contents: Do you know what a pinnacle turret is?
choices: A small dungeon with a bell
A hook to open doors with

explanations.contents: It is a small dungeon that was used as a watch tower to alert the population in case of a danger.
